titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 2846) to provide for the awarding of grants for the purchase of drugs used in the treatment of AIDS.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1021.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/30/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 2846 (AIDS drug assistance program).
